name: POTELIGEO

indications.text: poteligeo indicated treatment adult patients relapsed refractory mycosis fungoides ( mf ) sézary syndrome ( ss ) least one prior systemic therapy .

contraindications.text: 1 mg/kg intravenous infusion least 60 minutes days 1 , 8 , 15 , 22 first 28-day cycle days 1 15 subsequent cycle ( 2 ) .

warningsAndPrecautions: poteligeo ( mogamulizumab-kpkc ) injection sterile , preservative-free , clear slightly opalescent colorless solution supplied carton containing one 20 mg/5 ml ( 4 mg/ml ) , single-dose glass vial ( ndc 42747-761-01 ) .
indications_original: POTELIGEO is indicated for the treatment of adult patients with relapsed or refractory mycosis fungoides (MF) or Sézary syndrome (SS) after at least one prior systemic therapy.
contraindications_original: 1 mg/kg as an intravenous infusion over at least 60 minutes on days 1, 8, 15, and 22 of the first 28-day cycle and on days 1 and 15 of each subsequent cycle ( 2 ).
warningsAndPrecautions_original: POTELIGEO (mogamulizumab-kpkc) injection is a sterile, preservative-free, clear to slightly opalescent colorless solution supplied in a carton containing one 20 mg/5 mL (4 mg/mL), single-dose glass vial (NDC 42747-761-01).
